content:
It's possible that the username format is causing the issue. The `Add-Computer` cmdlet expects the username in the format `username@domain` or `domain\username`. Since you mentioned that the secret 'intro' only contains the username, it might be the root cause of the error.

To fix this, you can update the `$domainAdminUsername` assignment to include the domain name as well. Update the script like this:
```yaml
# Set variables
$domainAdminUsername = "$(intro)" + "@nmrp.com"
```
Alternatively, you can update the secret 'intro' in Azure Key Vault to include the domain name in the format `username@domain`.

Make this change and try running the pipeline again.
